intro: Here's a list of helpful links I've found while researching Konica AR lenses, roughly organized by topic.

lensSpecLinks.name: Comparative table of AR lenses at Konicafiles.com
Guide to Hexanon/Hexar lenses by Andreas Buhl
lensSpecLinks.helpText: (Mr. Buhl has created profile pages for each lens listed with specifications, photos, and subjective analysis. A great resource)

mountHistLinks.name: 'The Konica AR System' at Konicafiles.com
mountHistLinks.helpText: (Great writeup of the AR system and its evolution)

mountHistLinks.name: Konica AR Lens Production Timeline at Konicafiles.com
Konica Hexanon/Hexar lens Overview by Andreas Buhl

reviewLinks.name: Konica Lens Guide at Artaphot.ch
reviewLinks.helpText: (Note: Most content is in German, but Google Translate works well here)

repairLinks.name: Assorted Konica PDF Manuals preserved by Mike Butkus
repairLinks.helpText: (Most are camera manuals, but towards the bottom of the page there is one or two PDF documents specific to Konica lenses)

miscLinks.name: The Manual Focus Lenses forum at MFLenses.com
miscLinks.helpText: (This is the most active forum I've found on the subject of MF lenses of all manufacturers. A good resource)
